ISSUE.TITLE: New App - Spacexopedia
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, First of all thanks for creating such an amazing API. I have used this api to create [Spacexopedia](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thealphamerc.flutter_spacexopedia) app. Android App link:- https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thealphamerc.flutter_spacexopedia Project Repository:- https://github.com/TheAlphamerc/flutter_spacexopedia

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #396 from haroldadmin/fix-roadster-docs Fix link pointing to Roadster Info endpoint in docs
